mapper.select: select a.id, a.doc_id, a.approver, e.name as approver_name, a.stat, a.reason, a.ts from approval a left join emp e on a.approver=e.id

select a.doc_id, a.approver, e.name as approver_name, d.name as dept_name from approval a left join emp e ON e.id = a.approver left join dept d on d.chief = a.approver where a.doc_id = #{docId} order by a.approver desc
